name: Bon Bones
description:
Bon Bones is a tap game, rhythmic and thrilling.
You will interpret the appearance of one of the available races and try to destroy the fearsome final boss, progressing later with increasingly fearful enemies.

But remember once lost you will start again from level 1! 

Buy one of the 4 available races that you can get thanks to the little gold coins you get every time you defeat an enemy!
Try to understand the tactics of each enemy to know how to challenge him and remember to keep tapping!

The buttons that appear during the game are really simple: 

- click if it is white or green
- do not click if it is red.

Whenever you fail to press a white button your character will lose a life; you will lose a life even if you mistakenly press a red button!

HOPE YOU CAN PLAY THIS GAME AND GIVE ME FEEDBACK!
THANKS TO ALL OF YOU THAT HAVE TIME TO TRY THIS!

Content:

  • 4 Races
  • 10 Enemies

Features:

  • Save System
  • Unlock System
  • Enemy Difficulty
  • Stats
